fields.label: Is Private/Custom Trip?
fields.name: is_private_custom_trip
fields.instructions: Check the box if you do not want this trip to be indexed by Algolia and Google. It will also be hidden as a booking date from the PDP page.

sub_fields.label: Product Subtitle
sub_fields.name: product_subtitle
sub_fields.instructions: This subtitle is shown in the Overview Bar under the hero section

fields.label: Wow Title
fields.name: wow_title
fields.instructions: This title appears under the Wow Image description on the PDP

fields.label: Wow Summary
fields.name: wow_summary
fields.instructions: This appears under the Wow Title on the PDP

fields.label: Itineraries
fields.name: itineraries
fields.instructions: Select the Itineraries related to this product.

fields.label: Hotels
fields.name: hotels
fields.instructions: Select the Hotels related to this product.

fields.label: Bikes
fields.name: bikes
fields.instructions: Select the Hotels related to this product.

fields.label: Additional Details
fields.name: aditional_details
fields.instructions: Use only basic HTML elements and no heading bigger than H3
